levels.fact: Conan Doyle chose the name Sherlock in honour of Nottingham cricketers Sherwin and Shacklock. Originally it was Sherringford Holmes.

levels.fact: The sentence “The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog.” uses every letter of the alphabet.
